page.title: 01WINSTANLEY AND DISTRICT
page.content: The Block,lying to the west of Wigan, covers the communities of Pemberton, Orrell,Billinge and Winstanley,all now part of Wigan M.B.C.The north and east of the region are built_up.Pemberton has grown around a core of late Victorian properties and includes the area's major shops.Inter_war council housing and a sizeable industrial estate form the rest of it.Winstanley and Orrell have had extensive development in recent years.The main activity in the remainder of the Block is farming. {MOTORWAYS}- M6,M58 {EARLY CLOSING}- Wednesday {WAKES(HOLIDAY)WEEKS}- 1st + 2nd full wks. of July - 2nd wk. Sept. {PLACES OF INTEREST}-Orrell Water Park, Winstanley Hall,Abbey Lakes,Bispham Hall.{ {EVENTS}- Orrell R.U.F.C. Carnival.
